verbose_text: CYP3A4 is the CYP most highly implicated in drug metabolism; therefore, the MDS atelocollagen culture model can improve the sensitivity of drug metabolism assessments and the risk of drug induced liver injury evaluations; this is supported by the finding that CYP3A4 induction by rifampicin increased on 1- and 2-mg/cm 2 atelocollagen (XREF_FIG), suggesting that CYP3A4 induction is closely associated with the atelocollagen content.
